notesStmt.note: Defective at the beginning and at the end. Last folios mutilated. Stained.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The commentary of Gersonides (Leṿi ben Gershom aka Ralbag) on the Pentateuch.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Ashkenazi semi-cursive script, unpunctuated. Probably of the 15th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine: 'Levi ben Gerson. Comm. on the Pentateuch. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Additional 27,069.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Giuseppe Almanzi (b. 1801, d. 1860), Italian bibliophile: his manuscript no. 174: inscribed ; 322 Hebrew manuscripts were acquired from his library in 1865 through Asher & Co., Berlin dealer to the British Museum (see 131-153).
